flesh and blood of Cambodia after 25 years of efforts to
preserve and breed the Xim crocodile, a
very typical species of the pagoda country that
has escaped the brink of extinction
in the near future. 50 individuals of the Xim crocodile will be
released into the wild.
However, in the early 2000s, the X crocodile, one
of the rarest crocodiles in the
world, was thought to be extinct
until a surviving population of crocodiles was discovered
in
Cambodia.
Working with governments
and local communities to conserve and
develop
this species, we are doing that by
protecting habitats, monitoring populations,
and importantly, breeding them in
captivity.  Crocodiles
were reintroduced into the wild and are
protected by local patrols
in Cambodia. The recovery of
crocodiles is essential from an
ecological as well as cultural perspective as a
top predator.  maintaining the
harmony of the natural ecosystem, not only
that, this crocodile species is also very important
culturally because it is considered sacred by the indigenous people. There is an
international demand for
crocodile skin and a boom in the industry.  Crocodile farming

to the brink of extinction in

in Hoa Khanh Industrial Park in Da
Nang. At the time of the fire, many

Workers discovered a mud fire rising from the corner of

loud explosions and there was a risk of fire spreading to other
companies. The
Da Nang city police fire department
dispatched many fire engines.  The fire and
dozens of officers and soldiers arrived at the scene until
about 10 p.m. last night. The fire was
extinguished, although the fire burned down most of the
factory and many properties inside.

Vietnam's cybersecurity situation in 2023.
Recently, the number of cyber attacks on
organizations increased by 9  .5 minutes compared to 2022, an
average of 1,160 attacks per
month. The targets that suffered the most attacks
last year were government agencies,
banking systems, financial institutions,
industrial systems and
other key systems, especially  Especially in the fourth quarter of
2023, the number of cyber attacks increased sharply by more than
1,600 cases in a month, one and a half times higher than the
average, not only collecting,
editing, and leveling hacker data, but also publicly posting
gambling and betting advertising links.
Illegal buying and selling on
official websites The police recommend that
agencies and businesses

deploy security monitoring systems.
24/7 Collect complete activity logs

and regularly change the admin password.
